attributes.action: I want landlords to be more accepting of tenants with pets.
attributes.additional_details: As a pet owner looking for a new property to rent, and I finding it very frustrating as most won't accept pets.  I am not alone in this, pets can mean a lot to people, and can be helpful  I have carried out a search of properties in my area and only 1 out of 70 allowed pets.    Not all pet owners are irresponsible and allow their pets to destroy property.
attributes.background: I want parliment to stop landlords to stop discriminating against pet owner.  Maybe landlords could put a clause in their tenancy agreements if a pet damages anything the owner pays for it to be fixed.
